description:
Provides a VPC router interface resource aim to build a connection between two VPCs.

-> **NOTE:** Only one pair of connected router interfaces can exist between two routers. Up to 5 router interfaces can be created for each router and each account.

-> **NOTE:** The router interface is not connected when it is created. It can be connected by means of resource [alicloud_router_interface_connection](https://www.terraform.io/docs/providers/alicloud/r/router_interface_connection.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AccessPointId.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0.

Description.description: Description of the router interface. It can be 2-256 characters long or left blank. It cannot start with http:// and https://.

HealthCheckSourceIp.description: Used as the Packet Source IP of health check for disaster recovery or ECMP. It is only valid when `router_type` is `VBR`. The IP must be an unused IP in the local VPC. It and `health_check_target_ip` must be specified at the same time.

HealthCheckTargetIp.description: Used as the Packet Target IP of health check for disaster recovery or ECMP. It is only valid when `router_type` is `VBR`. The IP must be an unused IP in the local VPC. It and `health_check_source_ip` must be specified at the same time.

InstanceChargeType.description: The billing method of the router interface. Valid values are "PrePaid" and "PostPaid". Default to "PostPaid". Router Interface doesn't support "PrePaid" when region and opposite_region are the same.

Name.description:
Name of the router interface. Length must be 2-80 characters long. Only Chinese characters, English letters, numbers, period (.), underline (_), or dash (-) are permitted.
If it is not specified, the default value is interface ID. The name cannot start with http:// and https://.

OppositeAccessPointId.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0.

OppositeInterfaceId.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0. Use resource alicloud_router_interface_connection's 'opposite_router_id' instead.

OppositeInterfaceOwnerId.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0. Use resource alicloud_router_interface_connection's 'opposite_interface_id' instead.

OppositeRouterId.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0. Use resource alicloud_router_interface_connection's 'opposite_router_id' instead.

OppositeRouterType.description: It has been deprecated from version 1.11.0. resource alicloud_router_interface_connection's 'opposite_router_type' instead.

Period.description: The duration that you will buy the resource, in month. It is valid when `instance_charge_type` is `PrePaid`. Default to 1. Valid values: [1-9, 12, 24, 36]. At present, the provider does not support modify "period" and you can do that via web console.

Role.description: The role the router interface plays. Optional value: `InitiatingSide`, `AcceptingSide`.

RouterType.description: Router Type. Optional value: VRouter, VBR. Accepting side router interface type only be VRouter.

Specification.description: Specification of router interfaces. It is valid when `role` is `InitiatingSide`. Accepting side's role is default to set as 'Negative'. For more about the specification, refer to [Router interface specification](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/36037.htm).
